channel.title: [PI] adding donaters $ symbol? and donater only items?
channel.description:
Hey im trying to add a donaters symbol so when the talk they have a $ sign next to their name?
$player : can any1 help do this?
can any1 help with this
oh and also how to make items so only donaters can weild?

item.title: [PI] adding donaters $ symbol? and donater only items?
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

dgk_all_day:

er i didnt post this for people to say search for a tut…so if your here to say that please just dont comment

You shouldnt come onto the help section posting for something that there is already hundreds of tutorials for and expect someone to go through and type up a whole new tutorial for one person,

People make tutorials for a reason, so alot of people with the same problem can learn…

You should always try to figure it out on your own first, if you can’t, then find a tutorial explaining how, if you absolutely cannot find a tutorial with what you are looking for, then you post in the help section.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] adding donaters $ symbol? and donater only items?
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

Then look for the tutorial in the tutorials section. You might have to go back a few pages to find it though. And the reason that you only found snippets and such is because people are constantly asking how to do his in the help section… So all of thos posts of how to add it will make it harder to find the actual tutorial via search engine. My advice, just scroll through the tutorials section a few pages. A few can be up to ten btw.

Read full topic
